sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., brought in eight times what his Trump-endorsed primary challenger secured last quarter, while Rep. Fred Upton, R-Mich., raised more than five times what Trump-backed state Rep. Steve Carra brought in from October through December.
title: Overnight News Digest February 1, 2022

sentence: Fellow Michigan Republican Rep. Peter Meijer raised $529,000.
title: House Republicans close money gap in hunt for the majority

sentence: Leader McCarthy is very astute, sharp and savvy,? said Representative Peter Meijer of Michigan, another of the 10 Republicans who voted to impeach Mr. Trump.
title: Courting G.O.P.'s Mainstream and Extreme, McCarthy Plots Rise to Speaker

sentence: That's nothing new same thing happened last time.? Trump has come out against GOP Reps. Nancy Mace and Tom Rice of South Carolina, Jaime Herrera Beutler of Washington, and Peter Meijer of Michigan, among others.
